00003 #include "TROOT.h"

00005 #include "ORUtils.hh"

00008 void ORL4532mainTriggerDecoder::Swap(UInt_t* record)
00009 {
00010   ORUtils::Swap(record[1]); 
00011   ORUtils::Swap(record[2]); 
00012   /* Swap so we can tell if this has a timestamp.*/
00013   size_t startSwapFrom = 3;
00014   if (HasDoubleWordTimestamp(record)) {
00015     ORUtils::Swap(record[3]);
00016     ORUtils::Swap(record[4]);
00017     UInt_t dummy = record[3];
00018     record[3] = record[4];
00019     record[4] = dummy;
00020     startSwapFrom = 5;
00021   }
00022   for (size_t i=startSwapFrom;i<LengthOf(record);i++) {
00023     ORUtils::Swap(record[i]);
00024   }
00025 }
00026 
00027 double ORL4532mainTriggerDecoder::ReferenceDateOf(UInt_t* record)
00028 {
00029   double refDate = 0.0;
00030   if(HasDoubleWordTimestamp(record)) {
00031     refDate = (*((double*)(record+3)));
00032   }
00033   return refDate;
00034 }

00037 std::string ORL4532mainTriggerDecoder::GetParName(size_t iPar)
00038 {
00039   switch(iPar) {
00040     case 0: return "crate";
00041     case 1: return "card";
00042     case 2: return "eventCount";
00043     default:
00044       ORLog(kWarning) << "GetParName(): index (" << iPar
00045                       << ") out of range." << std::endl;
00046       return "unknown";
00047   }
00048 }
00049 
00050 UInt_t ORL4532mainTriggerDecoder::GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t /*iRow*/)
00051 {
00052   switch(iPar) {
00053     case 0: return CrateOf(record);
00054     case 1: return CardOf(record);
00055     case 2: return EventCountOf(record);
00056     default:
00057       ORLog(kWarning) << "GetPar(): index (" << iPar
00058                       << ") out of range." << std::endl;
00059       return 0;
00060   }
00061 }
